backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining Video, ScheduledPost, and Itinerary types with CRUD operations for managing videos, scheduled posts, and itineraries across Travel and AI Learning workspaces, including blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features related to debugging and verifying the VideoUpload component's Internet Identity login flow integration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components, hooks, utilities, and configuration files describing the application's UI structure, authentication, video management, and scheduling features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme CSS variables for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping the app with ThemeProvider, WorkspaceProvider, Layout, and three-tab navigation (Media Library, Schedule, Script Lab) using shadcn/ui components.
frontend/src/components/Calendar.tsx: Monthly calendar view component displaying scheduled posts with drag-and-drop support for scheduling videos, navigation between months, and integration with TimePickerModal for setting post times.
frontend/src/components/DateTimePickerMo: Modal dialog with calendar date picker and time input for scheduling posts, validating that selected datetime is in the future before confirming.
frontend/src/components/HelpModal.tsx: Help modal explaining the four-step workflow: upload videos, generate AI captions, schedule posts, and manually copy/post to social platforms.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with header, footer, and authentication controls. Handles Internet Identity login/logout with toast notifications and includes a help modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/MediaLibrary.tsx: Displays a grid of uploaded videos with upload functionality. Manages video selection for repurposing and playback through modals.
frontend/src/components/RepurposeModal.t: Modal for generating and editing AI-powered platform-specific captions (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok) for videos. Includes platform selection, caption editing, copy functionality, and scheduling integration.
frontend/src/components/ScheduleButton.t: Button component that opens a date-time picker modal and handles scheduling posts across selected platforms with generated captions.
frontend/src/components/ScheduledPostIte: Displays a scheduled post item with thumbnail, time, platform icons, and a copy-to-clipboard button for captions.
frontend/src/components/ScriptLab.tsx: AI-powered script generation tool for travel videos that creates editable itinerary scripts with hook, daily breakdown, and CTA sections. Includes video selection grid and copy-to-clipboard functionality.
Modal for selecting time and platforms when scheduling a post from the calendar view. Generates captions on-demand and validates future scheduling times.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Displays a video card with thumbnail/preview, caption, drag-and-drop support, and a repurpose button. Clicking the card triggers video playback via an optional onPlay callback.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayerModal: Modal dialog component that displays a full-screen video player with controls for a given Video object.
frontend/src/components/VideoUpload.tsx: Handles video file selection and upload with thumbnail generation, progress tracking, and Internet Identity authentication gating. Displays upload progress and login/upload state.
Toggle component that switches between Travel and AI Learning workspaces using context state.
frontend/src/contexts/WorkspaceContext.t: React context provider that manages current workspace state (Travel or AI Learning) with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login, logout, and identity management using @dfinity/auth-client with delegation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching videos and scheduled posts, uploading videos with progress tracking, scheduling posts, and saving itineraries via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for dark theme, touch-friendly sizing, and smooth scrolling optimizations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/captionGenerator.ts: Simulates AI caption generation by creating platform-specific captions (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok) from an original caption, each with appropriate tone, hashtags, and formatting for that platform.
frontend/src/utils/itineraryGenerator.ts: Generates a 3-day travel itinerary script with a cinematic hook, detailed daily activities, and a call-to-action, simulating AI generation with a 2-second delay.
frontend/src/utils/thumbnailGenerator.ts: Extracts a thumbnail image from a video file by seeking to 1 second (or 10% duration), drawing the frame to canvas, and returning it as a JPEG Uint8Array.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme tokens for UI components (sidebar, chart, card, etc.), and animation utilities for accordions.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing NicheHub as a mobile content management app with workspace management, AI caption generation, calendar scheduling, Internet Identity auth, and manual social media export workflow without direct API integrations.
